channel.title: About This Site – Glen's Parallax Perspectives
channel.description: This is independent from any organization or political party. It provides information, analysis, and resources about a wide variety of issues and opportunities related to peace, nonviolence, social justice, economic justice, and how to make our world better.

item.title: Disregard the “suggested readings” links at the bottom of my blog posts.
item.dc:creator: GlenAnderson
item.description: When you receive an e-mail notification of new posts to my blog, the bottoms of those e-mails include links to some “Suggested Readings.” I did not put those there, so you may disregard them. They were inserted by a company involved in my blog-hosting, so — like so many aspects of our society — they are advertising that distract us from real life.

item.title: Disregard the “suggested readings” links at the bottom of my blog posts.
item.dc:creator: GlenAnderson
item.description: When you receive an e-mail notification of new posts to my blog, the bottoms of those e-mails include links to some “Suggested Readings.” I did not put those there, so you may disregard them. They were inserted by a company involved in my blog-hosting, so — like so many aspects of our society — they are advertising that distract us from real life.

item.title: DISREGARD the “Suggested Readings” ads that are imposed at the bottom of post announcement e-mails.
item.dc:creator: GlenAnderson
item.description: If you subscribe to this blog, you are notified when new items are posted. At the bottom of the screens listing the new posts are some “Suggested Readings” links. PLEASE DISREGARD THAT ADVERTISING. It is imposed on the e-mail notifications without my consent.

item.title: TV series “Glen’s Parallax Perspectives” is consistent with this blog
item.dc:creator: GlenAnderson
item.description: This blog, parallaxperspectives.org, covers a wide range of issues. The TV series “Glen’s Parallax Perspectives” on TCTV cable channel 22 in Thurston County WA also covers this wide range of issues.  Cable TV subscribers in Thurston County WA can watch each new program on channel 22 every Monday at 1:30 pm, every Wednesday at 5:00 pm, and every Thursday at 9:00 pm for a full month.  Programs are posted to this blog before the end of the month when they’ll air on TCTV, and they remain posted on this blog long into the future.  Programs are posted to the “TV [...]

item.title: What does “parallax” mean?
item.dc:creator: GlenAnderson
item.description: The Establishment — mainstream culture, politicians, media, and other parts of the status quo — keeps seeing the world in conventional ways that keep perpetuating the world’s problems.  In order to change the world in better ways, we need to start seeing things differently.  Put one finger in front of your nose and another finger farther away.  Close one eye.  Then open it and close the other.  Your fingers will seem to move.  This is called a “parallax” view.  This blog addresses a wide variety of issues and invites people to look at them from fresh perspectives.  Enjoy looking at [...]
